description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Crazy Balloon Lite is a fun game of navigation and nerves.  Tha Land of the Balloons has been invaded by nasty spikes.  You need to navigate this overrun terrain to make it back to your balloon friends!
description.short: Crazy Balloon Lite is a fun game of navigation and nerves.  Tha Land of the Balloons has been invaded by nasty spikes.  You need to navigate this overrun terrain to make it back to your balloon friends!
